name: Cubix LowRez Edition
description:
Puzzle like it's the 90's again!

An old school arcade puzzle game that mixes the classics of the genre (mainly Tetris Attack, Magical Drop, and Klax) to bring you a new experience. Manage not one, but 2 boards at the same time, and try to stay alive as much as possible!

Ultra low 64x64 resolution for #LOWREZJAM

Music by Kevin McLeod ( https://incompetech.com )

Controls
Player 1
W A S D Movement
Q E Fast Rise

Player 2
I J K L / Arrows Movement
U O / Shift Control Fast Rise

* In Single player mode, you can use both controls schemes

Menu
Player controls / Arrows for navigation
Space to select

How to play
  • Use your cursor to move cubes around. Left / Right to move the cursor, Up / Down to take and drop cubes
  • Match 3 cubes of the same color to clear
  • Try to survive as much as you can!
